alert.note: Alert for Southeast Fayette; Southeast Nicholas; Southeast Raleigh; Southeast Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 9:29AM EST until December 24 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST FRIDAY NIGHT... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO NOON EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the first Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain will gradually transition to rain this afternoon with an additional glaze of ice expected before changeover. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow with areas of blowing snow expected. A flash freeze is also expected on roadways due to rapidly falling temperatures Friday morning. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Raleigh, Southeast Fayette, Southeast Nicholas and Southeast Webster Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 AM Friday to noon EST Sunday. For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 1 AM Friday to midnight EST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Fayette; Southeast Nicholas; Southeast Raleigh; Southeast Webster
